alert.note: Alert for Audubon; Cass (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 5:57AM CDT until April 23 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Cass County in southwestern Iowa... Western Audubon County in west central Iowa... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 555 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles northeast of Walnut, or 13 miles northwest of Atlantic, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Elk Horn and Kimballton around 600 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Gray. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 50 and 58. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
